name: spimeh
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, wff w0, wff w1

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wex(s0, w1))
-| wi(w0, wal(s0, w0))
-| wi(wal(s0, w0), wex(s0, w1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wex(s0, w1))
-| wi(w0, wal(s0, w0))
-| wi(wal(s0, w0), wex(s0, w1))

body.origin:
|- wi(wal(s0, w0), wex(s0, w1))
-| wex(s0, wi(w0, w1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wex(s0, w1))
-| wi(w0, wal(s0, w0))
-| wex(s0, wi(w0, w1))

body.origin:
|- wex(s0, wi(w0, w1))
-| wex(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))
-| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wi(w0, w1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wex(s0, w1))
-| wi(w0, wal(s0, w0))
-| wex(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))
-| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wi(w0, w1))

|- wi(w0, wex(s0, w1))
-| wi(w0, wal(s0, w0))
-| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wi(w0, w1))
-| diffss(s0, s1)

comment: Existential introduction, using implicit substitution. Compare Lemma 14 of [Tarski] p. 70. (Contributed by NM, 7-Aug-1994.) (Proof shortened by Wolf Lammen, 10-Dec-2017.)
